title: 02/22/21 DPS Hour 3 Chris Mannix
itunes:title: 02/22/21 DPS Hour 3 Chris Mannix
description:
Chris talks to Dan about changes that will happen in the NBA by the trade deadline. Chris says that the Pelicans are not interested in a long term relationship with Lonzo Ball.
